pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Turtlemancers$() have an $(thing)easy$() way of making $(thing)some$() potions. Which currently are:$(li)Harming Potion$(li)Poison Potion$(li)Regeneration Potion

pages.title: Harming Potion
pages.text: Just don't harm inoccent creatures, ok?

pages.title: Poison Potion
pages.text: Just don't poison inoccent creatures, ok?

pages.title: Regeneration Potion
pages.text: Just don't heal non-inoccent creatures, ok?
